title: Scripty "B"
content:
Any idea on this font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119060449im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/b_5553.jpg)

 [‹ Name this type character](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119060449/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42134 "Go to previous forum topic") [wrong ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119060449/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42606 "Go to next forum topic")
author: muna0001

comments.content:
Not a font. Mucca Design is known for doing their own lettering.

You might like [Gill Floriated](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119060449/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/gill_floriated_caps_mt_std/) or [Bodoni Classic Bambus Initials](http://web.archive.org/web/20081119060449/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/wiescher/bodoni_classic_bambus_initials/).
Ohhh, great to know. Thanks much!
